job.title: Machine Learning Engineer-Photos
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brDo you have a passion for building the best photo library in the worldbrbrbriPhone is the most popular camera in the world Detailed integration of software and hardware has delivered magical experiences like Photos Memories and Portrait Mode The Camera amp Photos team creates privacyrespecting machine learning technologies to ship emotional experiences to hundreds of millions of users worldwidebrbrbrWe are looking for an outstanding machine learning engineer to develop stateoftheart algorithms and infrastructure for the next generation of thoughtful and personal products we deliver If you thrive at the intersection of algorithms applied machine learning and graphs this position will excite and inspire youbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brDemonstrated expertise machine learning related to graphs or rankingrecommendation systemsbrbrExceptional problemsolving and interpersonal skillsbrbrKnowledge of data structures algorithms and objectoriented programmingbrbrGood programming skills in PythonbrbrHandson experience working with deep learning toolkits such as Tensorflow PyTorch or KerasbrbrProven experience or education in linear algebra statistics graph theory Bayesian statistics desirablebrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brIn this role you will ideate prototype and develop new ways of using knowledge graphs to power machine learning algorithms for a suite of learning problems including clustering ranking and classificationbrbrbrCandidates should have a proven track record that demonstrates academic aptitude strong collaboration excellent communication skills and a passion for designing high quality algorithms with the user experience in focusbrbrbrThe candidate needs to show initiative take ownership of a problem and work crossfunctionally to collect information solve problems and disseminate findingsbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brMS  PhD in Computer Science or equivalent experiencebrbr brstrongAdditional Requirementsbrstrong brPerforming quality assurance and testing of the developed routines and applicationsbrbrPrototyping designing developing and shipping new personalized experiencesbrbrWorking multifunctionally to connect knowledge across the platform and create intelligent customerfacing featuresbrbr brRole Number 200273865brbr
